-e ---

𓄭 #SPR spare-rib

𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | rib | żebro@POL 𓃗 <> stripe

𓄭 𓂻 | arrive, reach, come | arriba

𒅈𒄭𒅖 ar-ḫi-iš 𒅈𒄭𒅖 arise, immediately come

𓋴𓊪𓂋𓄭 rib : żebro@POL 𓃗 spare-ribs 𓄭𓂋𓊪𓋴 reversed @𓃗? repro ребро́ 𓂋𓊪𓄭 rzebro ⇔ reciproke?
𓋴𓊪𓂋𓄭 sprechen s'preach *sprekaną speak s'pre.kaną super.kaną carne se.kaną sagjaną

F42 𓄭 (#SPR:spare)rib(A) 𓄭 << … speiche, spring <<<

𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 𓀁 | make petition | sprechen? √super…? supplicare! supplicate 𓄭:cut
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 𓀁 | make petition | supplicare!! sub-plicō under-fold <<<+++++
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | appeal to, petition (someone) | √sprechen preach pray 𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓏏 𓄭 𓀁 | petition | sparta spreach spare 𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓏏 𓄭 𓍘 𓇋 | petitioner | sporttion / sprtition ⇔ pretition
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓅱 𓄭 𓀁 𓀀 | petitioner | deSparado

𓊃 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 𓂻 | arrive | *supervenire > pervenio 𓊃 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 𓂻 | arrive |saabuma < dospeti prispeti ≠ ժամանել žamanel
𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 𓂻 | arrive, reach, come | bereiken पहुँचना pahũcnā pervenio pro-

𓄭 𓂻 arrive < arriba < rib
𓄭 𓂻 reach ⋍ ribs

𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | rib | żebro@POL 𓃗 spare-ribs 𓄭𓂋𓊪𓋴 reversed @𓃗? repro ребро́ 𓂋𓊪𓄭 rzebro ⇔ reciproke?
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | rib | 𓋴borda parsû 𓊪𓂋𓋴 pasali पसली 𓊪𓋴𓂋 ++++ πλευρά 𓋴borda spare-Teil > אלעא < ضلع ḍelʕ 𓄭𓏏 sparta
𓋴 𓊪 𓎛 𓏏 𓄬 | ribs of beef | spare… sHt ⇔ Speck Schwarte sParte !? Span-🐖 ++<<?
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | rib | g-p-r > g-b-r ҡабырға qabïrğa ⇔ parsû πλευρά pleurá पसली paslī 𓊪𓋴𓂋𓄭 (permuted)
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | rib | g-p-r > g-b-r > g-r-b Gerippe > g-l-b 갈비 galbi
𓋴 𓊪 𓂋 𓄭 | rib | spare > spiel spline > 𐎕𐎍𐎓 ṣlʿ ≠ silhuette , spine

𓋴 𓊪 𓏏 𓂏 | lip, vulva | sparte Spreitz-Lippe 𓂏 Scham-Lippe 𓂎 lip ⇔ rip𓄭
